title: Gran Turismo vs Real Life
description: Insta360 Link (Get an extra 5% off with my link!)    Insta360 X3 (Get a free selfie stick here!)    Today we load a PlayStation 5 in a real life car on a race track to determine, is it faster to be a gamer or an actual driver?  Ken's latest @Denki video:  The latest @thisis video:    Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:   Chapter Title: 0:00 PS5 vs Real Life 0:49 Insta360 Link 2:11 Test Laps 3:21 Loading PS5 Setup 5:32 First Lap 7:03 Final Race 8:27 Was the PS5 better?
